name: Battle Power Mega
description:
Battle Power is a real-time platform shooting 2-players game, where each player must defeat their opponent using a wide variety of projectile weapons. But be careful! Each move  and decision must be taken rapidly and carefully, as you have to attack your enemy at the same time you avoid their shots!

You can also check the previous version, which featured a 1-player mode:
https://champol.itch.io/battle-power-ultra
